document.full_text: a top palestinian security official said police had arrested a member of the islamist hamas group over the assassination of award-winning arab-israeli actor and director, juliano mer khamis.
document.title: hamas suspect held in west bank actor killing: palestinians
lines_and_colors: a top palestinian security official said police had arrested a member of the islamist hamas group over the assassination of award-winning arab-israeli actor and director, juliano mer khamis.
